description.zh-cn: 中国现代政治人物，中国共产党党员。曾任卢氏县副县长，在1957年反右派斗争中被迫害致死。
description.en: A modern Chinese political figure and a member of the Communist Party of China. He served as the deputy magistrate of Lushi County and was persecuted to death during the Anti-Rightist Campaign in 1957.

description.zh-cn: 中共卢氏县地下县委负责人，在抗日战争期间介绍杨文渭加入中国共产党。
description.en: Head of the underground Lushi County Committee of the Communist Party of China, who introduced Yang Wenwei to the party during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 河南省三门峡市下辖县，杨文渭的出生地及主要工作地点。
description.en: A county under the administration of Sanmenxia City, Henan Province. It was the birthplace and primary place of work for Yang Wenwei.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of China.

description.zh-cn: 指20世纪中期第二次世界大战中，中国抵抗日本侵略的全面战争。
description.en: The full-scale war between China and the Empire of Japan before and during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 位于河南省灵宝市的一所中学，杨文渭曾于1946年在此任教。
description.en: A middle school located in Lingbao, Henan Province, where Yang Wenwei taught in 1946.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的主要政党之一，其当局曾在1946年逮捕杨文渭。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China. Its authorities arrested Yang Wenwei in 1946.

description.zh-cn: 位于卢氏县的学校，杨文渭曾在此担任教导主任。
description.en: A school in Lushi County where Yang Wenwei served as the dean of studies.

description.zh-cn: 卢氏县的教育行政部门，杨文渭曾在此担任副科长。
description.en: The education administrative department of Lushi County, where Yang Wenwei served as a deputy section chief.

description.zh-cn: 卢氏县的国家行政机关。
description.en: The state administrative organ of Lushi County.

description.zh-cn: 1957年在中国大陆发起的一场政治运动，杨文渭在此期间因受批判迫害而自杀。
description.en: A political campaign launched in mainland China in 1957, during which Yang Wenwei committed suicide due to persecution and criticism.

description.zh-cn: 杨文渭是卢氏县横涧乡七寸街人。
description.en: Yang Wenwei was a native of Qicun Street, Hengjian Township, Lushi County.

description.zh-cn: 在抗日战争期间，经赵致平介绍成为中国共产党党员。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, he became a member of the Communist Party of China through the introduction of Zhao Zhiping.

description.zh-cn: 赵致平在抗日战争期间介绍杨文渭加入中国共产党。
description.en: Zhao Zhiping introduced Yang Wenwei to join the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 在抗日战争期间结识赵致平，并与之成为好友。
description.en: He met Zhao Zhiping during the Second Sino-Japanese War and they became good friends.

description.zh-cn: 1946年，杨文渭前往灵宝中学教书。
description.en: In 1946, Yang Wenwei went to Lingbao Middle School to teach.

description.zh-cn: 1946年，因和中共地下党员频繁联络，杨文渭被国民党当局逮捕。
description.en: In 1946, Yang Wenwei was arrested by the Kuomintang authorities for frequent contact with underground members of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 解放军攻占卢氏县后，杨文渭回到卢氏县工作，担任卢氏县联中教导主任。
description.en: After the People's Liberation Army captured Lushi County, Yang Wenwei returned to work in the county and served as the Dean of Studies at Lushi County Lianzhong.

description.zh-cn: 曾先后担任卢氏县联中教导主任、卢氏县教育科副科长等职。
description.en: He successively served as Dean of Studies at Lushi County Lianzhong and Deputy Section Chief of the Lushi County Education Section.

description.zh-cn: 1956年，杨文渭当选为卢氏县副县长。
description.en: In 1956, Yang Wenwei was elected as the deputy magistrate of Lushi County.

description.zh-cn: 在1957年反右派斗争中，杨文渭遭遇残酷批斗，受到错误批判，不堪政治压力跳井身亡。
description.en: During the Anti-Rightist Campaign in 1957, Yang Wenwei faced cruel struggle sessions and wrongful criticism, and unable to bear the political pressure, he committed suicide by jumping into a well.
